channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pentagon will begin review of 'effectiveness' of women in ground combat positions

item.title: More seniors are becoming homeless. Shelters are trying to adapt
item.description: Older adults are the fastest-growing homeless population across the U.S. Now some shelters are trying to make it easier to accommodate older people.

item.title: These numbers tell the story of the Los Angeles wildfires, one year later
Netflix pulls Chinese drama after Vietnam's outcry over disputed map
item.description: An episode in the drama Shine on Me features a map depicting contested claims in the South China Sea.

item.title: 1/5: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: The latest reporting on former Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro's not guilty plea to drug trafficking charges and new details on his capture.

item.title: 1/5: CBS Evening News
item.description: New details on the covert operation to capture Venezuela's Maduro and his wife. Plus, what happened Monday in Maduro's court appearance.

item.title: Former Uvalde officer accused of not protecting students during 2022 shooting goes on trial

item.title: Indian gang rape survivor back home after a week in hospital
